title: Product Ordered With Laptop
description: Write a query to find all products that were ordered in the same order as Laptop Pro. Display only the other product name (exclude Laptop Pro itself).
hint: Use a subquery to find order IDs that contain Laptop Pro, then find other products in those orders.
solution: SELECT DISTINCT products.name FROM products INNER JOIN order_items ON products.product_id = order_items.product_id WHERE order_items.order_id IN (SELECT order_items.order_id FROM order_items INNER JOIN products ON order_items.product_id = products.product_id WHERE products.name = 'Laptop Pro') AND products.name != 'Laptop Pro'
